inputs.name: fortifyBuildId
inputs.label: Build ID for Fortify SCA
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build ID is used to find and check the uploaded artifact status in SSC. It is the original uploaded fpr file name.

inputs.name: fortifyApplicationName
inputs.label: SSC application name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the SSC application name. Application names in SSC are case-sensitive.

inputs.name: fortifyApplicationVersion
inputs.label: SSC application version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the SSC application version. Application versions in SSC are case-sensitive.

inputs.name: fortifyApplicationVersionId
inputs.label: SSC application version ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the SSC application version ID. The application version ID is a numeric value. You can find it in your project url in the fortify dashboard https://servername/ssc/html/ssc/dashboard/

inputs.name: property1

inputs.helpMarkDown: name of the property e.g. [fortify priority order]

inputs.name: property1_values
inputs.label: fortify property values
inputs.helpMarkDown: comma separated values. values appear in an OR clause. (e.g. Low,Medium,High,Critical)
